subEvent.name: Research Data Management
subEvent.description: The Research Data Management (RDM) day aims to cover (and perhaps answer) a range of pre-publication struggles, from structuring FAIR meta-/data through the search for insights and sharing those with others, all in preparation for day 3 -- Public Resources.

workFeatured.name: Invited Talks (4 videos, playlist length: 50min)

subEvent.name: Session 1
subEvent.description:
This session is aimed at our community
          attending from Oceania, Asia, Europe or Africa.

subEvent.name: Q&A session
subEvent.description: Discussion of invited talks, flash talks, and wider RDM topics

subEvent.name: OMERO.figure Workshop
subEvent.description: This session will show how figures can quickly be created using OMERO.figure. New workflows showing a more advanced work with ROIs in OMERO.figure will also be presented.

subEvent.name: Break-out sessions
subEvent.description: Including OMERO.figure for beginners, scripting OMERO.figure, and RDM round-table

subEvent.name: Gather in the Imagesc Island beach bar

Public Resources
subEvent.description: The Public Resources day will explore several repositories providing access to published reference datasets composed of (but not limited to) images.

workFeatured.name: Invited Talks (5 videos, playlist length: 57min)
workFeatured.description: Invited Talks for the Day 3 (Public Resources) of OME 2021

workFeatured.name: Flash Talks (4 videos, playlist length: 10min)
workFeatured.description: Flash Talks for the Day 3 (Public Resources) of OME 2021

subEvent.name: Session 1
subEvent.description:
This session is aimed at our community
          attending from Oceania, Asia, Europe or Africa.

subEvent.name: Q&A session
subEvent.description: Discussion of invited talks, flash talks, and wider Public Resources topics

subEvent.name: IDR Workshop
subEvent.description: Introduction to the IDR ecosystem will be shown on concrete examples of IDR studies. Images and metadata mining and comparison workflows will be presented. The first, hands-on section will show the cross-studies searches using OMERO.web. The second section will expand on these possiblities showing complex metadata mining and plotting as well as image reanalysis in Jupyter notebooks.

subEvent.name: Break-out sessions
subEvent.description: Including IDR submission, IDR analysis and Public Resources round-table

subEvent.name: Gather in the Imagesc Island beach bar

subEvent.name: IDR Workshop
subEvent.description: Introduction to the IDR ecosystem will be shown on concrete examples of IDR studies. Images and metadata mining and comparison workflows will be presented. The first, hands-on section will show the cross-studies searches using OMERO.web. The second section will expand on these possiblities showing complex metadata mining and plotting as well as image reanalysis in Jupyter notebooks.

subEvent.description: Including IDR submission, IDR analysis and Public Resources round-table

subEvent.name: Gather in the Imagesc Island beach bar
Teaching and Training
subEvent.description: The Teaching and Training day aims to cover the use of open platforms like OMERO for teaching and how to train users or evaluate your favourite software/algorithms using platforms presented in Day 3 -- Public Resources, and how to take advantage of resources during Day 2 -- Research Data Management.

subEvent.name: OMERO trainers Workshop
subEvent.description: This session will introduce the materials available for running a successful OME workshop, lead you through the steps necessary for replicating OME Team training setups and discuss possible imrpovements and modifications of such setups.
